actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat the noncash remuneration paid to certain workers on fishing boats as self-employment income for purposes of the Federal Insurance Contributions Act, and for purposes of Federal income tax withholding requirements.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code, that the noncash remuneration paid to qualified workers on fishing boats shall be treated as self-employment income for purposes of the Federal Insurance Contributions Act, and for purposes of Federal income tax withholding requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat the noncash remuneration paid to certain workers on fishing boats as self-employment income for purposes of the Federal Insurance Contributions Act, and for purposes of Federal income tax withholding requirements.
